feels.name: Surprise
feels.quote: When she met him she looked surprised, though it was impossible to help suspecting that she had come for that express purpose.

feels.name: Delight
feels.quote: When he offered her his arm, she took it with a look that filled him with delight.

feels.name: Confusion
feels.quote: But, owing to the flutter she was in, everything went amiss; she upset the tray of needles, forgot the silesia was to be 'twilled' till it was cut off, gave the wrong change, and covered herself with confusion by asking for lavender ribbon at the calico counter.

feels.name: Reproach
feels.quote: Did you believe that I should go with no farewell to those who haf been so heavenly kind to me?

causedByEvent.name: Jo thinking he had gone without saying goodbye

hasObject.name: Jo thinking he had gone without saying goodbye

feels.name: Delight
feels.quote: He offered her his arm, she took it with a look that filled him with delight.

feels.name: Bewilderment
feels.quote: He was beginning to see that on some occasions women, like dreams, go by contraries.

feels.name: Cheerfulness
feels.quote: He put the parcel under his arm with a more cheerful aspect, and splashed through the puddles as if he rather enjoyed it.

causedByEvent.name: Buying items for the farewell feast

hasObject.name: Buying items for the farewell feast
